Detailed Description

Core window handling class.

This class is the interface between Windows and the game. It handles creation of the window as well as the message pump. The class is based off of code found in Jim Adams' Programming Role Playing Games with DirectX.

Member Function Documentation

BOOL SystemCore::Run (  ) 

Main SystemCore entry point.

This function registers and creates the window, then enters the windows message pump.

Returns:
FALSE if something goes wrong, TRUE if the application successfully exits.
